name: This Is Not A Game (PedrinskiBRC)
description:
THIS IS NOT A GAME was created and developed by Pedro "Pedrinski" Gastaldi, and Juan Ignacio "Juanzet" Nuñez. We both are Game Dev students from Argentina, and this was our first Game Jam.
The game consists of an Top down shooter, where you must survive for a whole minute, fighting against enemies hordes. But be careful, because you should be studing, not playing....
